name: Bounce Shot Mechanics
description: Core bounce shot system mechanics and interactions
special_rules: Enemies targeted by bounce shot cannot be hit toward the tower with knockback
Once a target is selected, projectiles will chase that enemy even if knocked beyond maximum bounce range
Bounce shot mechanics can be enhanced by various cannon modules
Bounce shot perk can increase maximum targets from 8 to 14
unlock_requirement: Workshop: 10,000 coins after unlocking Rapid Fire

bounce_chance.description: Chance for projectiles to bounce between enemies

bounce_targets.description: Number of times a projectile can bounce
bounce_targets.perk_enhancement: Can be increased to 14 targets with Bounce Shot perk

bounce_range.description: Range projectiles can travel between bounces
